sentences.en: The bathtub was too small to stretch out in.
sentences.cn: 这个浴缸太小了躺不下。

sentences.en: It took half an hour to clean the orange powder off the bathtub.
sentences.cn: 用了半个小时才把浴缸里的橙色粉末擦掉。

sentences.en: All the time Stephen was lying face down and unconscious in the bathtub.
sentences.cn: 斯蒂芬始终面朝下趴在浴缸里，不省人事。
